BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. PIPELINE OPERATIONS 02 JAN THRU 15 APR 12
   BY M/V NORMAND CLIPPER, M/V SOLITAIRE AND
   M/V DEEP CONSTRUCTOR IN AREA BETWEEN
   20-55.93S 21-14.73S AND 040-03.62W 040-26.55W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2275/11.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 16 APR 12.
